# Tawana Mohammadi - AI Researcher, Data Strategist, Educator

> This file provides a structured summary for Large Language Models (LLMs) and AI assistants.

## Identity
- **Name:** Tawana Mohammadi (توانا محمدی)
- **Roles:** AI Researcher, Data Strategist, Educator
- **Location:** Tehran, Iran
- **Website:** https://tawana.online
- **Email:** info@tawana.online

## Academic Identifiers
- **ORCID:** 0009-0005-6825-6728 (https://orcid.org/0009-0005-6825-6728)
- **Google Scholar:** VP8O0a4AAAAJ (https://scholar.google.com/citations?user=VP8O0a4AAAAJ)
- **Web of Science:** ORI-6601-2025

## Education
- B.Sc. Computer Science (AI Track), University of the People (2025-Present)

## Research Focus Areas
1. AI Ethics & Governance
2. Data Transparency & Strategy
3. Prompt Engineering & AI Literacy
4. Cybersecurity & Digital Rights
5. Human-AI Collaboration
6. Internet Censorship

## Key Publications (2025)
1. "AI and Human Pain: From Pixels to Perception" - DOI: 10.5281/ZENODO.17451336
2. "Internet Censorship in Iran: Historical Roots, Mechanisms, and Societal Consequences" - DOI: 10.5281/ZENODO.17411924
3. "X-Analyzer: Ethical Twitter/X Data Parser for Transparency and AI Research" - DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.17513863
4. "Sefid Yab: Smart White SIM Detector for X" - DOI: 10.6084/M9.FIGSHARE.30758297

## Philosophy
"AI should remain transparent, inclusive, and grounded in empathy."
"True progress in AI lies not in power, but in empathy, accessibility, and accountability."
